document_data.mainbody:
wand of color was a magical wand that allowed the user to change the color of any bolt of cloth or garment, as per the alteration spell, color.
This type of wand was crafted in the shape of a finely made painters brush. It was made with ease-of-use in mind and could be recharged quite simply, with a single casting of the spell color.
* Martel Desden A transmuter and artist who traveled with the Jack Mooney & Sons Circus
